sentences.en: "He'll have to go on a diet," Ballard quipped.
sentences.cn: “他得减肥啦，”巴拉德俏皮地说。

sentences.en: a salt-free diet
sentences.cn: 无盐饮食

sentences.en: Are there plenty of fresh fruits and vegetables in your diet?
sentences.cn: 你的饮食中新鲜果蔬充足吗？

sentences.en: Diet and relaxation are two important keys to good health.
sentences.cn: 限制饮食和放松身心是保持健康的两个要诀。

sentences.en: Fish and rice were the mainstays of the country's diet.
sentences.cn: 鱼和米是该国的主要食品。

sentences.en: Give yourself a healthy glow on our detox diet.
sentences.cn: 我们的解毒食谱将会让您容光焕发。

sentences.en: He cut down on coffee and cigarettes, and ate a balanced diet.
sentences.cn: 他喝咖啡和吸烟都比以前少了，饮食也均衡了。

sentences.en: He lived on a diet of water and tinned fish.
sentences.cn: 他仅靠喝水、吃鱼罐头过活。

sentences.en: I'm forever on a diet, since I put on weight easily.
sentences.cn: 我永远都在减肥，因为我很容易长胖。

sentences.en: I've been dieting ever since the birth of my fourth child.
sentences.cn: 自从我第4个孩子出生以后，我就一直在节食。

sentences.en: It is important to have a balanced diet.
sentences.cn: 饮食均衡很重要。

sentences.en: It is well known that bamboo shoots are a panda's staple diet.
sentences.cn: 竹笋是熊猫的主要食物，这是人所共知的。

sentences.en: It makes sense to eat a reasonably balanced diet when slimming.
sentences.cn: 在减肥过程中保持饮食的营养相对均衡是明智的。

sentences.en: Lyn always seems to be on a diet.
sentences.cn: 琳恩似乎一直在节食。

sentences.en: New diet books appear at a rate of nearly one a week.
sentences.cn: 新的饮食类书籍差不多一周出一本。

sentences.en: Not all diets are good for you.
sentences.cn: 不是所有的节食方法都适合你。

sentences.en: Rice is the staple diet (= the main food that a group of people usually eat ) .
sentences.cn: 大米是主食。

sentences.en: She doesn’t eat a very healthy diet .
sentences.cn: 她的饮食不是很健康。

sentences.en: She doesn’t eat a very healthy diet.
sentences.cn: 她的饮食不是很健康。

sentences.en: Some cases of arthritis respond to a gluten-free diet.
sentences.cn: 无麸质饮食对一些关节炎患者有疗效。

sentences.en: Some people can diet like crazy and not lose weight.
sentences.cn: 有些人拼命节食也不能减肥。

sentences.en: The radio had fed him a diet of pop songs.
sentences.cn: 他从广播里听到的都是千篇一律的流行歌曲。

sentences.en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
sentences.cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

words.tran_cn: 规定的食物；饮食的规定
给…规定饮食；喂食（diet的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 易消化的饮食；清淡饮食
地中海饮食；地中海型饮食

trans.tran_cn: 日常饮食，规定饮食，节食，大量
trans.tran_en: a way of eating in which you only eat certain foods, in order to lose weight, or to improve your health
a way of eating in which you only eat certain foods, in order to lose weight, or to improve your health
to limit the amount and type of food that you eat, in order to become thinner
to limit the amount and type of food that you eat, in order to become thinner
